text: The Puthia Temple Complex is a group of important old Hindu temples in Puthia Upazila, Rajshahi Division, Bangladesh. It is located 23 km to the east of Rajshahi city. It has the largest number of historic temples in Bangladesh.McAdam, Marika. (2004) Lonely Planet's Bangladesh. pp. 114-115. ==References== Category:Hindu temples in Bangladesh
title: Puthia Temple Complex
